Articles.Content: <figure><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_nk36p1QSnl1rr2wit.jpg"/></figure><p>Little Katie submitted an entry to our contest, but instead of simply making a picture she submitted a video in which you can see Katie create her painting while listening to her explanation of why Valentina Tereshkova is a bad-ass woman! <br/></p><p>A well deserved fanwork spotlight. <br/></p><figure data-url="https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DTmO86yJFgqk" data-orig-height="304" data-orig-width="540" data-provider="youtube" class="tmblr-embed"><iframe id="youtube_iframe" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TmO86yJFgqk?feature=oembed&enablejsapi=1&origin=https://safe.txmblr.com&wmode=opaque" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="281" width="500"></iframe></figure>
man i wish i had half her talent at drawing

That's fantastic!

Well, she also submitted a picture.

Can you post a link please so I can +rep

EDIT - nevermind, found it

Edited February 21, 2015 by MartGonzo

Here ya' go.

I find it sad that the Soviet Union really only flew Valentina as a publicity stunt. She was up there not to be a BadS, but to prove to the world that Soviets regarded both genders as equally capable of entering the workforce, because Communism!

She did just as well, if not better, than many of the male cosmonauts who flew the early space missions. And yet, the next Soviet woman to fly into space was Svetlana Savitskaya, and she didn't fly until 1983. Sometimes these things just ain't fair.

Anyways, very nice drawing Little Katie! I'm glad you did some research as well... spaceflight is so cool
Hi, nice pic. I saw it on the thread, and I even made two entries on the same one! (Please judge me on my second entry)

Awe man, thanks Squad!! I feel like the game you guys have made is just the best thing ever. I can't even say how happy it made me feel to see that you like something I made and the nice things you said about it.

I probably have about half her talent at drawing if I really give it a try.
man i wish i had half her talent at drawing

That's how I feel when I see the cool things people do in KSP!

Wow,

I do photography in my spare time and I feel like she can draw a better picture than I can take with my camera!
